@graph.name: Our Values - Route4Me Core Principles - Route4Me
@graph.description: Discover Route4Me's core values of transparency, velocity, integrity, performance, intensity, and sustainability that drive our route optimization solutions and guide our customer relationships.
@graph.keywords: route optimization values, logistics transparency, high-velocity software, sustainable transportation, logistics integrity, high-performance routing, environmental sustainability, carbon reduction, route planning ethics, logistics team culture

@graph.name: Route4Me Corporate Values
@graph.description: Route4Me's six core values guide our approach to business: High-Transparency for honest, upfront practices with no hidden fees; High-Velocity with dozens of software updates weekly through our decentralized team structure; High-Intensity through our worldwide teams providing 24/7 service and development; High-Performance balancing speed with consistency and reliability; High-Integrity as an independent company funded by founders and customers, not venture capital; and High-Sustainability, having prevented over 10 billion miles from being driven—equivalent to planting 87 million trees—as a 99% carbon neutral company.

@graph.name: Learn About Route4Me
@graph.description: Contact Route4Me to learn more about our values-driven approach to route optimization

@graph.name: High-Transparency
@graph.value: Upfront pricing with no hidden fees, accessible technical documentation before purchase, and honest business practices

@graph.name: High-Velocity
@graph.value: Decentralized team structure enabling dozens of software upgrades weekly, rapid progress, and continuous improvement

@graph.name: High-Intensity
@graph.value: Non-traditional work structure with globally distributed teams providing 24/7 service and development, passionate employees available around the clock

@graph.name: High-Performance
@graph.value: Balancing speed with reliability, using benchmarking, continuous improvements, quality-control, high-availability, and open-mindedness

@graph.name: High-Integrity
@graph.value: Independent company funded by founders and customer revenue, not venture capital; focusing on long-term relationships without high-pressure sales tactics

@graph.name: High-Sustainability
@graph.value: 99% carbon neutral company that has prevented over 10 billion miles from being driven, equivalent to planting 87 million trees
